venue.name: Flatbread Pizza Company @ Sacco's Bowl Haven

item.description:
Pizza, conversation, and colleagues. Is there any better way to celebrate the end of the work week? Let's "do lunch" at Flatbread Pizza Company in Davis Square, an all-natural, wood-fired, clay oven pizza joint serving organic food from local farmers and local producers. Yelp reviewers give Flatbread 4 stars. The Flatbread website says they have "been introducing people to the magic of Earth and fire, and how that combination can produce incredible tasting pizza." Done! Count me in! Who's with me?

Click here for a look at the menu.

Click here to read the Yelp reviews.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the little foam elephant, or for the table-top signs.
item.name: Jumbo Lunch: Flatbread Pizza Company
